languages.text: "Ты права, никто не заслуживает оставаться в этом месте. Давай вернемся и еще раз обыщем шпиль".

traits.locale_text: "Ты права, никто не заслуживает оставаться в этом месте. Давай вернемся и еще раз обыщем шпиль".

languages.text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."
languages.original_text: "Ты права, никто не заслуживает оставаться в этом месте. Давай вернемся и еще раз обыщем шпиль".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let's go back and search the spire again."
"You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let's go back and search the spire again."
"You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."
"You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."
"You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

languages.text: «Tienes razón. Nadie merece que lo abandonen en este lugar. Volveremos y registraremos la torre una vez más».
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón. Nadie merece que lo abandonen en este lugar. Volveremos y registraremos la torre una vez más».

languages.text: 「お前の言う通りだ。誰もこんな場所に残されるべきじゃない。戻って、もう一度尖塔を調べよう」。
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言う通りだ。誰もこんな場所に残されるべきじゃない。戻って、もう一度尖塔を調べよう」。

languages.text: “你说得没错，没人该被留在这种地方。我们再回尖塔里找找吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，没人该被留在这种地方。我们再回尖塔里找找吧。”

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Personne ne mérite d'être abandonné ici. Retournons fouiller la tour. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Personne ne mérite d'être abandonné ici. Retournons fouiller la tour. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Niemand verdient es, an einem solchen Ort zurückgelassen zu werden. Lasst uns zurückgehen und erneut den Turm absuchen."
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Niemand verdient es, an einem solchen Ort zurückgelassen zu werden. Lasst uns zurückgehen und erneut den Turm absuchen."

languages.text: "Haklısın. Kimse burada mahsur kalmayı hak etmiyor. Geri dönüp kuleyi baştan arayalım."
languages.original_text: "You are right. No one deserves to be left in this place. Let us go back and search the spire again."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Kimse burada mahsur kalmayı hak etmiyor. Geri dönüp kuleyi baştan arayalım."
